entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [FromForm]: Support for JsonDerivedType #61378
  • [Unified Build] Signing of .js files in `microsoft.dotnet.web.projecttemplates.x.y.z.nupkg` #61376
  • Support/documentation for .NET Core debugging & hot reload workflows in Docker #61373
  • The Host initiated by WebApplicationFactory fails to terminate #61372
  • UB Build Failure: aspnetcore - Microsoft.AspNetCore.Runtime.SiteExtension\project.assets.json' doesn't have a target for 'net462/win-x86 #61371
  • UB Build Failure: aspnetcore - Cannot create a file when that file already exists #61368
  • Support responsive properties #61367
  • [Blazor] Publish does not correctly clean publish\wwwroot\_framework folder #61364
  • Bug Report: MapMethods with multiple HTTP methods fails #61363
  • Webassembly MSAL unsupported #61360
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #61357

Closed

  • Stateful reconnect doesn't work as expected when using Redis backplane #55575
  • Perf regression: kestrel-header-symbols, mvc, updates #61344
  • Perf regression: json #61345
  • event OnChange of Component forms is not fired #61289
  • Typo in AuthenticationMetrics.cs description #61311
  • Trim warnings from default <LayoutView> usage in Blazor Router / NotFound when AOT is enabled #61358
  • Perf regression: json_middleware #61350

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix trim annotations on generated validation code #61377
    area-networking
  • [release/8.0] Fix preserving messages for stateful reconnect with backplane #61375
    area-signalr, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0] Fix preserving messages for stateful reconnect with backplane #61374
    area-signalr, 9.0.x
  • Removed bound checks in SharedUrlHelper.IsLocalUrl and use JIT unrolling for checks #61361
    community-contribution, area-networking

Merged

  • Fix preserving messages for stateful reconnect with backplane #60900
    area-signalr, pending-ci-rerun, 10.0-preview4
  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-preview.4.25207.6 #61362
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 10.0-preview4
  • Typo in AuthenticationMetrics.cs description #61312
    area-networking, 10.0-preview4

Updated

  • Use Copy Constructor for JsonSerializerSettings #61251
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] Caching SERedis critical bugfix; defer HC metadata detection because of DI cycle #60916
    Servicing-consider, feature-caching, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, 9.0.x
  • Added System.Text.Json serialization-based JsonPatch implementation #61313
    area-mvc
  • feat: fetch TLS client hello message from HTTP.SYS #60806
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Quarantine OpenAPI tests #61349
    area-commandlinetools
  • Add `NotFoundPage` to `Router` #60970
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-routing, .NET 10 Planning
  • `HttpNavigationManager` no longer uses `NavigationException` #61306
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-navigation, 10.0-preview4
  • Make default stack size to be 1 MB in base16 #60811
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [M.D.Sqlite] improve support for GetSchema() #35917
    Backlog
  • Support optional collections mapped to JSON #35916
    Backlog
  • Add a way to register plugin-type services #35915
    Backlog
  • Add a service to configure conventions #35914
    Backlog
  • Avoid virtual redispatch between SaveChangesAsync overloads #35913

Closed

  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite with nhibernate - update Schema not working #31998

PullRequests

Updated

  • Add model building support for complex type collections #35905

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • XAML source generation (experimental) #28832
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Terminating app due to uncaught exception 'System.TypeLoadException', reason: 'VTable setup of type Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Editor failed (System.TypeLoadException) #28829
  • [Android] Group Header/Footer Repeated for All Items When IsGrouped is True for ObservableCollection #28827
  • CollectionView Displays Blank UI When Changing IsGrouped and ItemsSourceType #28826
  • MAP-Control Polyline,Polygon,Circle OnClicked Event #28825
    Backlog
  • [Windows] NullReferenceException thrown When Toggling IsGrouped to True in ObservableCollection Binding #28824
  • ToolbarItem behavior with ImageSource iOS #28822
  • I8-The footer position is not on the far right of the horizontal grid #28821

Closed

  • Xamarin.Firebase.Analytics is broken because of SDK privacy.manifest #28816
  • [iOS] ViewCell with ContextActions causes memory leaks #28689
    Backlog
  • XAML inflator fail setting nullable value types #28010
    .NET 9 SR7
  • Handling Views in Landscape & Portrait Mode #28808
  • Loading a resource dictionary based on a condition in MAUI8 #28653
  • iOS crash randomly when navigations several times #28691

PullRequests

Created

    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
  • Refactor MauiHybridWebViewClient #28831
    area-blazor, community ✨

Merged

  • [Testing] Fix for flaky UITests in CI that occasionally fail - 8 #28828
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed ListView leak caused by not disposed ContextActionsCell #28702
    community ✨, area-controls-listview, memory-leak 💦, t/perf
  • [Testing] Resaved TabbedPage UI Test Images for Catalyst Due to Tab Bar Background Color Variations #28803
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Fix for flaky Issue19509Test in CI #28807
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

Updated

  • [iOS] Trigger OnNavigatedTo method when hide the nav bar and using sw… #28694
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Android] Added Platform specific ripple color #23599
    proposal/open, community ✨, area-controls-button, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [Windows] - Fix Visual State Issue with Picker TextColor After Navigation #28746
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-picker, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Support for KeepLastItemInView for CV2 #28720
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, collectionview-cv2, .NET 9 SR6
  • [iOS] Fixed memory leak with PopToRootAsync when using TitleView #28547
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-titleview, t/perf, partner/syncfusion
  • [blazorwebview] align `SupportedOSPlatform` attribute with templates #25073
    proposal/open, area-blazor, .NET 10 Planning
  • [IOS] Inconsistent Resize Behavior for Header/Footer - fix #28713
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, area-controls-flyout
  • [iOS ]Fix for issue -> Disconnecting Map Handler causes Map to crash on second page entrance and moving to region #28795
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-map
  • [Android] Essentials - preferences - prevent Application.Quit() from closing application before SharedPreferences in-memory changes are committed to disk. #27635
    area-essentials, community ✨
  • [net10.0, Testing] Enabled failed UITests for Switch control due to new OffColor API. #28495
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fix for Transparent Background Color not applied to WebView #28804
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-webview, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Replaced MeasureInvalidated with IPlatformMeasureInvalidationController for Shell Flyout's Footer #28775
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell
  • [Windows] Fixed CollectionView throws NRE when value of IsGrouped property is changed to false #27331
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fixed the CollectionView Header and Footer Do Not Align with Horizontal ItemsLayout When EmptyView is Displayed" #28779
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Overriding back button functionality with OnBackButtonPressed returning false in a modally pushed page causes stack overflow - fix #28812
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, area-controls-modal
  • Fixed Footer not displayed at the Bottom When EmptyView in CV2 #28681
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Inheriting StatusBar and NavigationBar background colors on modal pages #28568
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, community ✨, area-controls-modal, .NET 9 SR6
  • [iOS] - Resolved Proper Rendering of Dynamic Header/Footer Updates in CV2 #28641
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fixed Shell.SearchHandler ClearPlaceholderIcon Color Issue #28601
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fixed the EmptyView and EmptyViewTemplate issues in CollectionView #28472
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for RadioButton BorderColor and BorderWidth not updated at runtime #28335

  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 18 #28033
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fixed an issue where an Editor with a small height inside a ScrollView would cause the entire page to scroll #27948
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed the picker items do not appear when tapping on the picker after navigating through PushModalAsync #28003
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, area-controls-picker, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed the Label text is cropped inside the border control with a specific padding value on certain Android devices #28259

  • Revert "Fix HideSoftInputOnTapped Not Working Net9 " #28802
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, test-flight
  • Android TimePicker ignores 24 hour system setting when using Format Property - fix #28797
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • Fixed Test case failure in PR 28486 #28780
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion, test-flight
  • Fix ScrollToPosition.Center behavior in ScrollView on iOS and MacCatalyst #26825
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, partner/syncfusion
  • [Proposal] Removed the default span styling from the template #28818
    proposal/open, area-templates, community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add EmitDifferenceOptions #78035
  • IntroduceVariableCodeRefactoringProvider fatal error #78027
    Backlog
  • Constant errors regarding "Diagnostic Analyzer runner" crashing #78025
  • Incorrect nullability analysis for extension method with inference #78022
    Next

Closed

  • Escaped Characters When Pasting Into Interpolated Strings #78026
  • Update inconsistent text in analyzer for Null-conditional Assignment #77985
  • Entiy framework query fails when using contains on an array and c# language preview is turned on #78021

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for FieldRva to EnC delta #78033
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • CSharp Completion Context - Add method caller context #78032
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Ensure external access extensions package gets codebase #78030
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix VB tests on MacOSX #78024
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2681361 #78029
  • Make a couple of features non-experimental #78028
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Be resilient to (and report) exceptions we encounter when calling into 3rd party extensions in a gladstone context. #78014
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Handle nameof(indexer) in ref analysis #78015
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Use dev17.14 for localization #78000
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Disable TransitiveVersioningPinning for RoslynAnalyzers. #78037
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Move MiscellaneousFilesWorkspace construction to background thread #78019
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Extensions: ref safety analysis #77967
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Expression trees: optional arguments #77972
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix crash in backing field nullability cycle scenario #77993
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Semantic Search: Add support for async queries and FAR tool #77906
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update `RuntimeHelpers.Await` rules #77957
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Runtime Async
  • Bind compound assignment operator declarations #77999
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, Feature-UserDefinedCompoundAssignmentOperators
  • Improve detection of code whose updates may not have effect #78009
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode
  • Execute core compiler from full framework msbuild #77914
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assertion failed '(targetReg == op1Reg) || (targetReg != op3Reg)' during 'Generate code' #114358
  • Support precompiling 'ComInterfaceEntry' vtables in ILC cctor interpreter (Native AOT) #114355
  • [Unified Build] Unsigned .js files in runtime artifacts #114353
  • SslStream RemoteCertificateValidationCallback has regressed to being unable to access protocol/cipher info #114351
    10.0.0
  • [wasm] Linux library tests are failing for reasons unrelated to the tests #114348
  • [9.0] Values differ assert failure in Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Internal.HostTests.WebHostStopAsyncUsesDefaultTimeoutIfNoTokenProvided #114344
  • [cDAC] Support APIs for reading line numbers #114336
  • [.NET 9.0] Random deadlock when terminating thread #114333
  • [apple-mobile][infra] Internal CI is failing with Bad CPU type in executable #114327
  • JIT: Likely incorrect side effect ordering with `Avx512F.VL.TernaryLogic` #114324
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed '(targetReg == op1Reg) || (targetReg != op3Reg)' during 'Generate code' #114322
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add RemoveFirst/RemoveLast of `List<T>` #114319
  • Test failure: baseservices/threading/regressions/beta2/437044/437044.cmd #114315
  • Test failure: profiler/dynamicoptimization/DynamicOptimization/DynamicOptimization.cmd #114314
    10.0.0

Closed

  • JIT: Assertion failed 'node->IsUnusedValue() && "found an unmarked unused value"' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #113338
    10.0.0
  • Native libraries not honoring Assembly load context. #114015
    Future
  • Stack overflow in workstation GC `try_allocate_more_space` #114301
  • PROPOSAL: AppDomain.MonitoringAllocatedMemorySizeSinceCollection #6061
  • Getting sddl string for ACLS with ACEs having Conditional Access Policy #114127
  • DateTime local-to-UTC conversion disagreement between Windows and Linux #114334
  • Assertion failed 'compCyclesAtEnd >= m_compCyclesAtEndOfInlining fails intermittently on freebsd-x64 Debug build #105472
    10.0.0
  • [Feature Request] CLR Object Pooling #7212
  • Explicit documentation of dependency binding changes in CoreCLR vs CLR WRT versions #42065

PullRequests

Created

  • Make CertificateRequest et al work with ML-DSA #114357
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • JIT: add note on stack security (GS) #114356
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Extend static constructor interpreter to support vtable-like structures #114354
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Alternate approach for HELPER_METHOD_FRAME removal for arithmetic divide (take2) #114352
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Update HttpTelemetry.Redirect helper visibility #114349
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • Annotate Microsoft.CSharp with RequiresDynamicCode #114346
    area-Microsoft.CSharp, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [cDAC] Implement IXCLRDataModule.GetFlags #114345
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Call build.cmd directly from build.sh #114341
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Bit counting intrinsics #114337
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix inadvertently upgrading compiler warnings to errors #114335
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove useless assert from assertprop #114332
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix inadvertently upgrading compiler warnings to errors #114331
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [infra][iOS][tvOS] Use x64 Azdo images for internal iOS/tvOS jobs #114329
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, os-tvos
  • CultureName "c" and "C" get mapped to Invariant Culture #114328
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • disable/trim MetricsHandler when System.Diagnostics.Metrics.Meter.IsSupported is false #114326
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • Reduce background GC allocations #114320
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Remove CreateFalse node during lowering, if MaskToVector is getting removed #114272
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Multi-target Microsoft.NET.HostModel #114343
    area-HostModel
  • [clr-interp] Implement a few minor opcodes #114312
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'release/9.0-staging' #114224
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Enable alljitcommunity in CI #114325
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #114223
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • JIT: remove dependence on GetThreadCycles #114290
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix inadvertently upgrading compiler warnings to errors in libs.native #114323
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono] Switch generic instance cache back to GHashTable; improve ginst hash function #113287
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Move funclets invocation to code managers #114180
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Fix warning in pal_x509_ios.c on newer clang #114321
    area-System.Security
  • [RISC-V] Fix RISC-V Windows build #114292
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-riscv

Updated

  • [wasm][interp] alias Vector operators to PackedSimd #114293
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2681637 #114238
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Name native threads before start (macOS/Native AOT) #114249
    area-System.Threading
  • Haiku: Initial runtime support #112323
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • Send host tests to helix #114187
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [DRAFT] Split up loader heap implementations #114246
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [clr-interp] Refactor passing of configuration environment variables #114300
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • HTTP/3: Eliminate near-zero "wait for connection" telemetry signals #114083
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • [infra][apple-mobile] Migrate Apple mobile jobs to `osx.15.[amd/arm64].open` queues #113313
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • [RISC-V] Simplifying the loop generated in genZeroInitFrameUsingBlockInit and jump encoding #114003
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix ordering issue in interface trimming #110098
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: enhance escape analysis to understand local struct fields #113977
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] event pipe - JavaScript part #110818
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Fix "MMM.yy" date parsing in German culture. #114169 #114194
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • ML-KEM: EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo exports #114304
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [S.T.J] Removed unused field in JsonProperty #114071
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Use `Stream.ReadAtLeast` when loading ZipArchives #114256
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging][mono][hotreload]Adjust row_size and size_bitfield from the baseline based on the delta sizes #114119
    Servicing-consider, area-EnC-mono, 9.0.x
  • JIT: Allow limited recursive inlining #112318
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • JIT: Boost inlining for more derived returns #113256
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Improve wrapper method inliner heuristic #113266
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Revamp the generation of runtime division checks on ARM64 #111543
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 10.0.0
  • [RuntimeAsync] Move runtime async to the main repo #113976
    NO-MERGE, new-api-needs-documentation, runtime-coreclr, runtime-async
  • SVE: Slightly better calculation of stack frame for ldr/str #114284
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Interpreter GC info stage 2: Generate empty GC info and add baseline implementation of EnumGcRefs #113948
    area-VM-coreclr, area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • Share implementation of ComWrappers between CoreCLR and NativeAOT #113907
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [cDAC] Adds DAC like entrypoint with new COM interface #113899
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [Android] Run CoreCLR library tests on Android #114148
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-android, 10.0.0
  • Refactor Sequential/Explicit layout to happen in the same phase where we do Auto layout #113454
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Skip rarely-run block expansion during flow opts when we have profile data #114311
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] msbuild leaks tesing #114258
    area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • [WinHTTP] Certificate caching on WinHttpHandler to eliminate extra call to Custom Certificate Validation #111791
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [RISC-V] Utilize `sh(x)add(.uw)` instructions #113999
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Arm64: Implement region write barriers #111636
    arch-arm64, area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Dev/rokonec/101022 httplistner mem leak #114098
    area-System.Net
  • Fix for XSLT extension methods format-date & format-time #114200
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 135.0.7049.52, windows: 135.0.7049.42 #114303
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add GC heap hard limit for 32 bit #101024
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Run static class constructor before pinvoke resolution #114020
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging][wasm] remove problematic default settings #112216
    area-Workloads, 8.0.x
  • Add bootstrapping build mechanism and enable for SourceBuild #114285
    source-build, area-Infrastructure
  • [RISC-V] Introduce Zbb #114150
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-07
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Should platform package pruning data represent GA of a framework or the serviced version? #44566
    9.0.2xx
  • Enable running Microsoft.NET.Build.Tasks.UnitTests in CI #25508
  • Add download link for specific SDK version #26255
  • Shared framework ships runtimeconfig.json with unwanted policy settings #32969
  • `dotnet --info` should not cause a worklog log to be emitted #36441
  • The "GenerateStaticWebAsssetsPropsFile" task failed unexpectedly #37456
  • `dotnet publish` fails intermittently on macOS with "error code -10" and no additional information #37472
    Discussion
  • Revert minimum msbuild changes that were checked in to unblock 8.0.1xx codeflow #36216
  • Error dialog when creating a .NET 10.0 WinForms project: You must install or update .NET to run this application #48126
  • Microsoft.DotNet.SDK.8 - "No applicable installer found" when using scope=machine #48066

Updated

  • CanIgnoreTemplateGroupsWithConstraints flaky test failing in CI #46212
  • dotnet watch - Failure in DeleteSubfolder test with polling #46454
  • aspnetcore build failure - Child node 7 exited prematurely #46398
  • [dotnet watch] Cannot open project Lib.fsproj because extension fsproj is not associated with a language #46378
  • Build failure in VMR Vertical Build Windows_x64: Downloading vswhere - Process cannot access sdk.txt because it is being used by another process #45809
  • Workload Feature Band Test Sometimes Fails #45314
    10.0.1xx
  • Template engine tests hitting known parallelism issue in GetVisualStudioInstances #44878
    10.0.1xx
